ai-patthana23.42:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means to the extent of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana23.42:0.3_0: looking forward to the donor, etc.
ai-patthana23.42:1.1_0: Not for the sake of grasping, nor for the sake of grasping, nor for the sake of the surmounting of the life, etc., is the condition for the sake of grasping, and for the sake of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana23.42:1.1_1: The six faculties in brief, are the six classes of rebirth without being apprehended, three, four, five, three, six, seven, eight parts, and nine faculties. ...
ai-patthana23.42:2.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to repulsion of insistence on views, or grasping.
ai-patthana23.42:3.1_0: Not grasping, they don’t give rise to repulsion in not grasping.
ai-patthana23.42:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
